UpdateRow: UPDATE dimaccount acc SET acc.AccountName = ?, acc.IsActive = ?, acc.LastUpdatedDate = NOW() WHERE acc.AccountKey = ?
InsertRow: INSERT INTO dimaccount (AccountKey, AccountName, IsActive, LastUpdatedDate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, NOW())
GetRowWithKey: SELECT acc.AccountKey, acc.AccountName, acc.IsActive, acc.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimaccount acc WHERE acc.AccountKey = ?
